name: Bank Threat Model
description: Threat model for a bank, covering critical assets and associated threats.

assets.name: Customer Data
assets.description: Personal and financial information of bank customers.

threats.name: Data Breach
threats.description: Unauthorized access to sensitive customer data.

threats.name: Phishing Attack
threats.description: Attackers trick users into providing credentials.

assets.name: Banking Infrastructure
assets.description: Core banking system responsible for transactions and account management.

threats.name: Ransomware Attack
threats.description: Malware encrypts banking data, demanding ransom.

threats.name: Insider Threat
threats.description: Malicious or compromised employee causing data leaks.

assets.name: Online Banking Portal
assets.description: Web and mobile applications for customer banking transactions.

threats.name: DDoS Attack
threats.description: Overloading the banking website to cause downtime.

threats.name: Credential Stuffing
threats.description: Attackers reuse leaked credentials to gain access.

assets.name: ATM Network
assets.description: Automated Teller Machines (ATMs) across multiple locations.

threats.name: Physical Tampering
threats.description: Attackers install skimmers to steal card data.

assets.name: Internal Employee Systems
assets.description: Email, HR, and finance tools used by bank employees.

threats.name: Phishing Attack
threats.description: Employees are tricked into downloading malware.
